      • configure

        public void configure(org.apache.commons.configuration.Configuration configuration)
        Configuration parameters for an interval are:
        • [@left] (int)

          Left extremum
        • [@right] (int)

          Right extremum
        • [@closure] (String)

          Interval closure. Supported values are "closed-closed", "closed-open", "open-closed" and "open-open". Default value is "closed-closed".
        Specified by:
        configure in interface IConfigure
        Parameters:
        configuration - Configuration settings
